column5: Business, personal or family travel? Any or all of these - welcome to our home! Frisco is centrally located in north Dallas and growing rapidly. Our home is nice but not stuffy; bright and open but still private; friendly but never intrusive. Guest rooms are upstairs and share a bath for guests only. We're happy to get to know you--or not. Your choice! You are our guests and your comfort is our primary focus. The Dallas North Tollway is close and will take you anywhere. Make yourselves at home!
column8: Two Rooms: King bed, shared bathroom
